TopicTitle: FTL Drive MK I (MKII Pictures inside)

Articles.Content: OK, so I'm back at work, there's one final error to correct and i'm breaking my teeths on it. Almost done...

For starters, use the Battery as the only fuel tank. It eats fuel like no tomorrow. Otherwise, it's your standard engine , 'cept the thrust , with is magnified exponentially.

Thanks for that info, I know that already, i'm looking for some support guys, as i have said i have said battery and FTL drive connected, but it DOES NOT work, no thrust, no nothing. please help
hmm i might need this to make to hyperspace and see if i can go beyond the solar system if you get my point.
Epic I am so getting this ship even if I have to get on a rocket jeb. Lol
